1.title: Welcome to Cheshire

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Meet the UK's most glamorous residents! Explore their glamorous, glorious and fun-packed lives culminating in a Cheshire's Crème De la Crème Ball!

2.title: This Is Ladies Night

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: A cosy dinner ends in bitching at Ampika's, with Tanya and Lauren throwing some serious hits. Dawn feels betrayed by those she thought she could trust.

3.title: The Girl Who Got It All

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Did you hear what she said? The ladies rehash the drama of Ampika's get together, and the fallout from Tanya's book launch ain't all that pretty.

4.title: Dressed for Success

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The patter of tiny feet? There's a pregnancy scare for someone while Dawn confides in Ashley. And will Magali show up at Leanne's charity auction?

5.title: Spa-ing Partners

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A spa break at a beautiful Cheshire castle is on the agenda for the ladies this week, but drama is never far away - especially when Lauren's involved!

6.title: Going Quackers

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Big Night Out

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Old foes turn friends in this episode, as Lauren leaves for Arizona with Paul. And what is supposed to be an elegant dinner party ends in drama, natch.

8.title: Happy Birthday Sweetie

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A rabbit having a party? You heard right - just another day in the lives of the Cheshire wives. But it's not all fun, as Ampika gets some bad news.

9.title: Lady Luck

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Watch out! The tension between Ampika and Dawn deepens, while a casino night leads to chaos as friendships are ruptured.

10.title: Who's Coming to Dinner?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Who said we were friends? A swanky dinner party at Dawn's ends in fractions between the wives by the end of the night.

1.title: Off the Rails

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Everyone's favourite Housewives are back and, as always, there's never a dull moment in Cheshire. It's Tanya's birthday and there's trouble brewing and rumours flying between the Housewives.

2.title: Girls on Film

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Magali takes a newly single Ampika on a makeover shopping trip, Tanya gets to the bottom of those cheating rumours and at the girls' summer barbecue Lauren is outraged to hear that Leanne videoed Magali's outburst on the train.

3.title: You'll Never Be Me

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Magali confronts Leanne about the train video and Ampika gets an unexpected visitor. Lauren indulges in some fat freezing and there's trouble brewing at the Cheshire Polo Match, with the Housewives divided and a huge showdown between Dawn and Magali.

4.title: 20 Years and Counting

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Leanne hosts a very Cheshire christening for her daughters Lilia and Lola, with Dawn and Tanya as godmothers. Magali spends some family time with Dean as they visit their footballing son Kenji in Swansea.

5.title: Karma Is a B...

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Dawn and Ashley watch daughter Darby compete in Cheshire's prestigious Bolesworth International Equestrian Event. Leanne & Tanya jet off to Portugal and are in for a surprise meeting on the beach.

6.title: Ladies Who Lunch

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Tanya plans a charity calendar and Dawn hosts a glamourous lunch to reunite all the Housewives. Dean has a romantic proposal for Magali and Lauren plays matchmaker for Ampika. Magali announces her exciting news to the group, and gets some very mixed reactions...

7.title: Calendar Girls

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Magali heads to London to find the wedding dress of her dreams, while Lauren and Tanya indulge in some 24 carat gold facial acupuncture. Sparks fly on the set of Tanya's charity calendar photoshoot as Ampika clashes with some old adversaries.

8.title: Uninvited

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Housewives attend Leanne's teen fashion launch. Lauren sets Ampika up on a blind date that doesn't' quite go to plan, and at Tanya's Charity calendar launch Dawn discovers that she isn't invited to Magali's big day, so will any of the girls be going?

9.title: I Do, I Do, I Do

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: It's Magali's big day as she prepares to renew her wedding vows with Dean, but as some people are not invited will any of the Housewives turn up to the event? And the arrival of an unexpected gift starts tongues wagging...

10.title: The Masks Are Off

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Ampika hosts a glamourous Masquerade Ball to celebrate her birthday but the night doesn't go to plan, with plenty of explosive drama kicking off amongst all the Housewives.

1.title: All Change in Cheshire

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Three new wives join the group with a boatload of drama in tow.

2.title: A Currant Affair

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Stacey hosts a glamorous dinner party for all the Housewives. Will everyone get along or will someone be eating humble pie by the end of the night...?

3.title: Divas Dancing

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: As Ampika's feelings for her ex grow stronger, Dawn attempts to clear the air with Missé but comes to blows with bestie Leanne on a night out with the girls...

4.title: Shaken and Stirred

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Misse throws a glam cocktail party where Seema has a surprise for some of the girls. And the battle for Queen Bee heats up as Dawn & Stacey go head to head.

5.title: Fabulous at 40

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Leanne hosts a glam birthday party where Ampika's outfit turns heads and later Lauren drops a huge bombshell at the end of the night.

6.title: A Cheshire Girl in Paris

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Seema takes her latest collection to Paris Fashion Week with Tany & Stacey, who all say oh la la' when a couple of unexpected guests crash the show.

7.title: Going In-Seine

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The girls take Paris by storm, with Missé and Ampika attempting to move on after their clash at Seema's Paris fashion show, but will it last?

8.title: Five Month Scan

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Tanya has a scan to find out the sex of her baby and reveals the news to the women in typical Bardsley style, while Dawn clashes with Leanne.

9.title: Ready for Battle

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Ampika drives a wedge between Dawn and Leanne, Stacey is furious after a makeover disaster and Tanya storms out of a shampoo launch event.

10.title: Point of No Return

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: There is trouble brewing on the eve of Taylor Ward's 18th birthday party and Dawn and Ampika come face to face for a dramatic final showdown.

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

1.title: A Fair to Remember

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Return of the reality series following a group of women who reside in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Tanya enters the final stages of her pregnancy as friendships reach breaking point. Dawn plays the doting mother-in-law as daughter Taylor brings her boyfriend home - much to her dad's horror. Seema prepares her Autumn-Winter fashion collection while Misse gets back into modelling as a runway bride.

2.title: Welcome to The Jungle

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Reality series following a group of women who reside in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Stacey hosts a graduation garden party for her daughter, but things take a turn for the worst with a chaotic arrival. Leanne throws a jungle-themed baby shower for Tanya - but will the arrival of Ampika cause a rumble in the jungle?

3.title: Whining and Dining

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Reality series following a group of glamorous women who live in one of the UK's most affluent areas. The girls continue to take Paris by storm. Misse and Ampika attempt to move on after their clash at Seema's Paris fashion show. Back in Cheshire, Lauren gets naked for a portrait painting session.

4.title: Bust-ups and Bombshells

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Tanya prepares for the imminent arrival of baby number four with a visit from the Baby Whisperer. Lauren is fuming with Seema after their dinner party bust-up. Ampika launches her latest business venture, but will all the girls be there to support her? Misse drops a bombshell about her marriage. Recent dramas come to a head as Leanne has words with Dawn.

5.title: Ooh Baby Baby

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Baby Bardsley's arrival is imminent and Tanya will try anything to get him out. Ampika shows Mark that she is the best swinger in town with a round of golf. Leanne and Dawn engage in another battle of wits. Dawn decides to plan an international surprise for Misse's birthday, but will all the girls be excited?

6.title: Secrets and Lies..?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Tanya arrives home with baby Ralphi and gets a visit from godmothers-to-be Dawn and Leanne. The ladies jet off to Barcelona for Misse's 30th birthday, where she confides in Dawn about her ongoing marriage problems. Ampika opens up to Leanne about trouble in her love life and questions Misse's motives for inviting her on the trip.

7.title: Heartbreak Hotel

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. The ladies continue their glamorous trip to Barcelona with more shock revelations and tears. Misse is annoyed to hear that Ampika doubted her invitation, while Ampika opens up to Lauren and Leanne about her secret love life. At a very tearful final dinner, Misse reveals her marriage heartbreak to the entire group. Meanwhile, back in Cheshire, Tanya puts her placenta to good use.

8.title: The Smell of Successl

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot:

9.title: Plastic Fantastic

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. It is the day of Dawn's grand opening and Ashley jets off to Monaco - will the clinic be ready in time? Lauren hears what Seema and Stacey said about her perfume launch. Ampika signs up to find love with a megabucks dating agency and makes a very special surprise entrance at Dawn's party.

10.title: Bollywood or Bust

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Reality series following a group of women who live and work in one of the UK's most affluent areas. Bollywood comes to Cheshire as Seema hosts a 45th birthday extravaganza. Post-birth Tanya has an extreme beauty treatment. Lauren is fuming that Seema criticised her perfume launch and wants to have it out with her. Tanya gets her sari in a twist over Stacey, resulting in an explosive argument at Seema's party.

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The ladies make a splash as they attend a pool party. Stacey's confession forces Tanya to face her fears. Ester's loyalties are tested, leaving her to question her friendship with Dawn.

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The guest list for Dawn's blessing is confirmed, but who is invited? Ester's attempts to heal old wounds do not all go to plan. Nermina hosts an explosive pink party to remember.

4.title: A Blessing in Disguise

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The ladies' trip to Gibraltar descends into chaos thanks to some mischievous monkeys. Relationships reach breaking point as insults fly.

8.title: Reach for the Stars

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The women keep busy with a music video to make, a skydive to complete and a Creme Ball to prepare, but a surprise invitation at Seema's birthday party might help to mend old friendships.

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Tanya finally hosts the big Bardsley christening and with everyone dressed up to the nines, tensions come to a head in an unexpected twist.

imdb.plot outline: Rich glamorous powerful and well preserved housewives allow cameras into their lives to show viewers their lives warts and all. A new instalment of the popular series from Cheshire UK. Dawn top of the social ladder long time football wife. Leanne dawn's side kick also football wife. Lauren born & breed in Cheshire. Ampika single divorcee with happy family envy. Tanya young & down to earth party loving football wife. Magalia firey South American imported football wife.
imdb.title: The Real Housewives of Cheshire
akas: The Real Housewives of Cheshire (United Kingdom)
plot: Rich glamorous powerful and well preserved housewives allow cameras into their lives to show viewers their lives warts and all. A new instalment of the popular series from Cheshire UK. Dawn top of the social ladder long time football wife. Leanne dawn's side kick also football wife. Lauren born & breed in Cheshire. Ampika single divorcee with happy family envy. Tanya young & down to earth party loving football wife. Magalia firey South American imported football wife.::paulapresley
